__e: Le Grand Duc is listenning to you
If the Duke is unwilling to finance your farm, sir, you may be forced to sell his story to the newspapers.
The Duke's sole responsibility now is to protect the future king.
What does Monsieur le Duc have to say to all this?
One silly duke, more or less.
He said: "Follow them. I wanna be the Duke of Montreal."
There has never been anything evil between the duke and myself in the past nor was any future evil intended.
See, I know something you and the Duke don't know.
Don't you know there has never been a word between the duke and myself that couldn't be shared by all the eyes in the world?
